class.name: transmission_interface/SimpleTransmission
class.description: This transmission relates one actuator and one joint through a reductor (or amplifier). Timing belts and gears are examples of this transmission type.

class.name: transmission_interface/FourBarLinkageTransmission
class.description: This transmission relates two actuators and two joints through a mechanism in which the state of the first joint only depends on the first actuator, while the second joint depends on both actuators.

class.name: transmission_interface/DifferentialTransmission
class.description: This transmission relates two actuators and two joints through a differential mechanism
